[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [FieldDropdown](./blockly.fielddropdown_class.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./blockly.fielddropdown_class._constructor__1_constructor.md)

## FieldDropdown.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `FieldDropdown` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(menuGenerator: MenuGenerator, opt_validator?: FieldDropdownValidator, opt_config?: FieldConfig);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  menuGenerator | [MenuGenerator](./blockly.menugenerator_typealias.md) | A non-empty array of options for a dropdown list, or a function which generates these options. Also accepts Field.SKIP\_SETUP if you wish to skip setup (only used by subclasses that want to handle configuration and setting the field value after their own constructors have run). |
|  opt\_validator | [FieldDropdownValidator](./blockly.fielddropdownvalidator_typealias.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> A function that is called to validate changes to the field's value. Takes in a language-neutral dropdown option &amp; returns a validated language-neutral dropdown option, or null to abort the change. |
|  opt\_config | FieldConfig | <i>(Optional)</i> A map of options used to configure the field. See the \[field creation documentation\][https://developers.google.com/blockly/guides/create-custom-blocks/fields/built-in-fields/dropdown\#creation](https://developers.google.com/blockly/guides/create-custom-blocks/fields/built-in-fields/dropdown#creation) for a list of properties this parameter supports. |

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->TypeError<!-- -->} If `menuGenerator` options are incorrectly structured.
